name: Skill Bus Parking Advance
description:
Skill Bus Parking Advance which you will ride on luxury bus and drive bus in city excellent environment. Beautiful real city environment with huge buildings around will attract you to get chance of playing this game. Barriers has been placed in an open real city era and a small narrow track has been made for you to drive bus in this track and reach the final point in given amount of time.
features:
Excellent HD graphics of Panama decision bus
Background sound effects
New gear with turbo fast speed
New airport buses to select
Easy and smooth steering controls
Many camera views
